name: appworld.co
tag_list: iphone, iphone-webapps, android, window-7, nokia-ovi, mobile-apps, best-mobile-apps
overview:
Appworld.Co is the social networking website for mobile apps of all major platforms from various app stores. It is one place in the world where one can find top apps from various appstores - Apple IPhone, IPhone Web Apps, Android, Blackberry, Nokia Ovi, Windows 7. This is the great place to see what app the people are liking/playing/using the most in different platforms.

Services of the website are - (a) One can easily browse and search for the best apps in the market of all the platforms. (b) One can comment on a particular app. (c) One can like a particular app. (d) One can tell they playing or using a particular app and can know what people are playing at present in the market. (e) Registered members can maintain their liked app list or play list. (f) One can recommend apps to their friends. (g) One can make friends with other appworld.co users (h) One can find related apps very easily using related service in the website. (i) More importantly it is ad-free.

More features coming soon.

It is also a great opportunity for the developers publish their mobile app in this website to advertise it for free.

This is a unique idea of having mobile apps of all the major platforms from various app stores in one place and making them social at the same time. The main idea of this project is to make all the apps of all the platforms under one roof. This is a great opportunity for the developers to see what kind of users exists in the market. No more hassle to look for different websites for different platform apps.

Good News!!! Within a short period of time, have seen a lot of traffic.
